author: Erin Ailworth
title: The New Energy Majors: Wind and Solar College Degrees
text:
Jazirae Duncan always wanted to go to Texas Tech University and major in something related to science and technology.
But when she graduates next month, it won’t be with a degree in petroleum engineering or any of the majors traditionally offered by this springboard school to the energy industry—it will be with a bachelor’s in wind power.
“It’s...
